title: Contiguous 41 States
alt: Linguists, settling some inscrutable grudge, have been steadily sneaking more backdated synonyms for 'sharing borders' into the dictionary. They've added 'contiguous,' 'coterminous,' 'conterminous,' and next year they're adding 'conterguous.'
transcript:
[Heading above the panel:]
The Contiguous 41 States[A map of the United States, missing Delaware, Kansas, New Mexico, Nebraska, North Dakota, Pennsylvania, and South Dakota, along with Alaska and Hawaii.][Caption below the panel:]
Tired of being left off maps of the US, Alaska and Hawaii begin producing maps with other states missing, too.
